title: macOS by Tutorials
description: If you're an iOS developer who wants to branch out into creating native macOS apps, this is the book for you!

title: macOS Apprentice
description: If you've always wanted to write your own native macOS apps, this is a great place to start. Learn to build beautiful and functional native apps.

title: SwiftUI by Tutorials
description: Build fluid and engaging declarative UI for your apps with way less coding with SwiftUI! SwiftUI by Tutorials, the complete guide to building fluid and engaging declarative UI for your apps — using less code — with SwiftUI!
authors: Antonio Bello, Bill Morefield, Sarah Reichelt & Audrey Tam
